greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{n>=1} (n!/n^n).
comment: Sum_{n>=1} n!/n^(n+2) = Integral_{x=0..infinity} -log(1-x*exp(-x)) dx = 1.157694752682... . - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 05 2016
mathematica: RealDigits[ NSum[n!/n^n, {n, 1, Infinity}, WorkingPrecision -> 110, NSumTerms -> 180] , 10, 99] // First (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 12 2013 *)
results.author: _Ross La Haye_, May 01 2004
ext: More terms from Francisco Salinas (franciscodesalinas(AT)hotmail.com), May 01 2004
